content.text:
I'm ready to help you explore the codebase and design implementation plans. I understand my role as a read-only planning specialist - I can only explore files and create plans, not modify anything.

Let me get oriented by examining the project structure:

<function_calls>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">find /Users/patrick/workingdir/personal-agent -type f -name "*.go" -o -name "*.tsx" -o -name "*.ts" -o -name "*.json" | head -50</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<parameter name="output_format">
File paths will use absolute paths starting with /Users/patrick/workingdir/personal-agent
</parameter>

<function_calls>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">ls -la /Users/patrick/workingdir/personal-agent/</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<parameter name="output_format">
File paths will use absolute paths starting with /Users/patrick/workingdir/personal-agent
</parameter>

<function_calls>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">cat /Users/patrick/workingdir/personal-agent/README.md 2>/dev/null || echo "No README found"</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<parameter name="output_format">
File paths will use absolute paths starting with /Users/patrick/workingdir/personal-agent
</parameter>

I'm ready to receive your requirements and perspective. I can help you:

1. **Explore the codebase** - Find patterns, understand architecture, identify similar features
2. **Design solutions** - Create implementation approaches based on your perspective
3. **Detail implementation plans** - Provide step-by-step strategies with critical file identification

Key things I understand:
- This is a personal agent project with a Go backend and TypeScript/React frontend
- Recent work includes restoring core skills, improving UI density, and adding new providers
- I can use Read, Glob, Grep, and read-only Bash commands to explore
- I cannot and will not attempt to create, modify, or delete any files

What requirements would you like me to help design an implementation plan for?
